mapper.select: SELECT RTNHD.SLS_RTN_HD_DATE, RTNHD.SLS_RTN_HD_NO, VEND.VEND_CD_NM, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, OUTHD.SLS_OUT_HD_NO, RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_DTL_VOL, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_PRICE, RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_DTL_PRICE, RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_DTL_PRC_CLS, RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_RESN, EMP.EMP_NAME, NVL(RTNHD.SLS_RTN_HD_REMK, ' ') AS SLS_RTN_HD_REMK FROM BF_SALES_RTN_HD RTNHD JOIN BF_SALES_RTN_DTL RTNDTL ON RTNHD.SLS_RTN_HD_NO = RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_HD_NO JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VEND ON RTNHD.VEND_CD_CODE = VEND.VEND_CD_CODE JOIN BF_SALES_OUT_HD OUTHD ON RTNHD.SLS_OUT_HD_NO = OUTHD.SLS_OUT_HD_NO JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE FNSPRD ON RTNDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON OUTHD.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID

SELECT DISTINCT RTNHD.SLS_RTN_HD_NO, RTNHD.SLS_RTN_HD_DATE, VEND.VEND_CD_CODE, VEND.VEND_CD_NM, EMP.EMP_ID, EMP.EMP_NAME, NVL(RTNHD.SLS_RTN_HD_REMK, ' ') AS SLS_RTN_HD_REMK FROM BF_SALES_RTN_HD RTNHD JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VEND ON VEND.VEND_CD_CODE = RTNHD.VEND_CD_CODE JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON EMP.EMP_ID = RTNHD.EMP_ID
WHERE SLS_RTN_HD_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{rtnSdate}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{rtnEdate}, 'YY/MM/DD') + 0.9999
ORDER BY SLS_RTN_HD_NO DESC

SELECT RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_DTL_NO, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, RTNHD.SLS_OUT_HD_NO, OUTDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO, OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_DTL_VOL, RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_DTL_BASE_VOL, RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_DTL_VOL, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_PRICE, RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_DTL_PRICE, RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_DTL_PRC_CLS, RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_RESN FROM BF_SALES_RTN_HD RTNHD JOIN BF_SALES_RTN_DTL RTNDTL ON RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_HD_NO = RTNHD.SLS_RTN_HD_NO JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE FNSPRD ON FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = RTNDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE JOIN BF_SALES_OUT_DTL OUTDTL ON OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_HD_NO = RTNHD.SLS_OUT_HD_NO JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON RTNHD.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID
WHERE RTNHD.SLS_RTN_HD_NO = #{slsRtnHdNo} AND OUTDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO = RTNDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO
mapper.insert:
SELECT SLS_RTN_HD_NO FROM (SELECT SLS_RTN_HD_NO FROM BF_SALES_RTN_HD ORDER BY SLS_RTN_HD_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
INSERT INTO BF_SALES_RTN_DTL VALUES ('SLS_RTND'|| LPAD(BF_SALES_OUT_DTL_SEQ.nextval, 3, 0), #{slsRtnHdNo}, #{finPrdCdCode}, #{fnsPrdStkLotNo}, #{slsRtnDtlBaseVol}, #{slsRtnDtlVol}, #{slsRtnDtlPrice}, #{slsRtnDtlPrcCls}, #{slsRtnDtlResn})
